price: Basi mcheni Mwenyezi Mungu na nit'iini mimi.
footnotes: Basi tahadharini na adhabu ya Mwenyezi Mungu, na ifuateni amri yangu kwa ninayo kuitieni.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
